segments.advisor_message: So, let's talk about your retirement plans. Do you have a specific age in mind when you’d like to retire?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I was thinking, like, ah, maybe around 65 or so? But, like, you know, it kinda depends on a lot of things, really, like, how my health is... and, you know, if I have enough saved up. Also, I just want to, um, enjoy life more, you know? Not just sit around doing nothing! I mean, I want to travel, maybe go hiking like I used to before my kids grew up and everything...

segments.advisor_message: That sounds wonderful! Traveling and staying active are great goals. Have you thought about where you’d like to travel?
segments.client_message: Oh, definitely! I’d love to go to, um, Europe? Maybe Italy or France, but honestly, just anywhere that, like, has some nice sceneries and food, you know? But then again, I’m, like, worried about money and if it’ll all work out. Like, am I saving enough? Should I be doing more now? It’s all kinda stressful sometimes!
